alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 2:53PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Madison and southeastern Beaverhead Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 252 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Alder to 12 miles south of Lima. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Virginia City, Ennis, Lima, Monida, Jeffers and Snowline. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 1 and 17 . Highway 287 between mile markers 47 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall may also lead to minor localized flooding and debris flow down steep slopes. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
